practice.notes: First practice session. Getting comfortable with the basic throw.
Focused on consistent height and hand position.
Starting to get more comfortable with one ball.

tips.title: Consistency is Key
tips.description: Short, regular practice sessions are more effective than occasional long ones.

tips.title: Focus on Form
tips.description: Perfect your technique before increasing difficulty. Quality over quantity.

tips.title: Track Your Progress
tips.description: Recording your practice sessions helps you see improvement over time.

tips.title: Start Simple
tips.description: Master one ball before moving to two, and two before moving to three.

tips.title: Use Different Props
tips.description: Try different props like balls, rings, and clubs to develop varied skills.

resources.title: Juggling and Your Brain
resources.description: Learn how juggling improves neural connections and cognitive function.

resources.title: Juggling and Technology
resources.description: Discover how juggling skills relate to technology learning and problem-solving.

resources.title: Juggling and Change Management
resources.description: Explore how juggling metaphors apply to managing change in organizations.

tutorials.title: Learn to JUGGLE 3 BALLS - Beginner Tutorial
tutorials.description: This comprehensive guide covers the 3-ball cascade, offering tips and troubleshooting advice.

tutorials.title: Juggling Tutorials Playlist
tutorials.description: A curated list of tutorials ranging from basic to intermediate tricks.

tutorials.title: HOW TO JUGGLE - Claymotion Juggling Tutorial
tutorials.description: An introduction to the Claymotion style, suitable for beginners.

tutorials.title: Learn to JUGGLE 4 BALLS - Tutorial
tutorials.description: Step up your juggling skills with this tutorial on the 4-ball fountain pattern.

tutorials.title: How to Juggle 3 Balls - Tutorial
tutorials.description: A step-by-step guide to the 3-ball cascade pattern.

tutorials.title: Learn to Juggle Tutorials Playlist
tutorials.description: A collection of tutorials covering various juggling skills.

tutorials.title: Tutorial - How to Juggle 2 Balls in 1 Hand
tutorials.description: Focuses on developing control and coordination with one-handed juggling.

tutorials.title: How to Juggle 4 Balls - Tutorial
tutorials.description: Learn the 4-ball fountain pattern with clear step-by-step instructions.
